description.narrative: Express Ticket is an online digital ticketing service dedicated to road transport. It offers travelers the possibility of booking or purchasing bus tickets in 60 seconds via the web (Internet) or Mobile platforms (SMS, USSD, Application). Billet Express pilot phase was launched in September 2016 and the production phase in June 2017, totaling more than 3,500 customers. Within a 5-year horizon, Billet express intends to become the leader in ticketing and innovative services in the field of transport in Mali and West Africa.

The infrastructure would include a fenced park, borehole, warehouse, shed, scale and other equipment that meet LAHAM standards. Financial management support would facilitate loan procurement from banks to fund animal acquisition. The Union would shift from marketing animals by individuals to marketing under the Union umbrella.

description.narrative: Sector: Cereal seed production.Beneficiaries: 5 full-time employees, 30 part-time employees, 550 seed producers (150 women), plus buyers of improved seeds.Description: Dunkafa produces and distributes certified maize, millet, sorghum and rice seed. It partners with 8 seed producing cooperatives with 585 producers. Dunkafa produces base seed that it distributes for multiplication to local seed producers that Dunkafa then collects, processes and distributes to its shops and network of clients. Dunkafa plans to expand its current 150 Tons of seed produced to 270 tons in 4 years. The proposed project will increase Dunkafa's processing and distribution capabilities through construction of a storeroom, and show room, acquisition of a seed processing unit and a distribution truck.
